Use when writing blog posts, creating social media content, analyzing brand voice, optimizing SEO, planning content calendars, or when user mentions content creation, brand voice, SEO optimization, social media marketing, or content strategy.

security_audit.summary: This skill consists of two Python text analysis scripts and markdown reference guides for marketing content creation. All static findings are false positives: the scanner misidentifies documentation examples (shell commands, system tool references, the word 'hash') as security threats. The skill performs read-only text analysis with no network calls, no sensitive file access, and no external command execution.

low_findings.title: Python scripts accept file paths as command-line arguments
low_findings.description: Both Python scripts read files passed via sys.argv for text analysis. This is necessary for their purpose but represents standard file handling capability.

content.user_title: Create SEO-Optimized Content with Brand Voice Analysis
content.value_statement: This skill helps you create marketing content that ranks well in search engines and maintains a consistent brand voice across all channels. Use the included analyzer scripts to score your content before publishing.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes brand voice characteristics including formality, tone, and perspective
Calculates SEO scores with keyword density and structure analysis
Generates meta tag suggestions including title, description, and URL slugs
Provides readability scoring using sentence length analysis
Includes 15+ content templates for blogs, social media, email, and video
Offers platform-specific optimization guidelines for 6 social platforms
limitations: Does not publish content to external platforms automatically
Does not perform live keyword research via external APIs
Does not generate images or visual content assets
Requires manual review and application of recommendations

use_cases.title: SEO Blog Posts
use_cases.description: Create and optimize long-form content that ranks in search engines with proper keyword placement and structure.

use_cases.title: Platform-Adapted Content
use_cases.description: Adapt core messages across LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok with platform-specific guidelines.

use_cases.title: Voice Consistency
use_cases.description: Establish and maintain consistent brand voice across all marketing channels and content types.

prompt_templates.title: Quick Blog Post
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Content Creator skill to create a blog post about [topic] targeting the keyword [keyword]. Include an SEO-optimized title, meta description, H2 structure, and recommendations for keyword density.

prompt_templates.title: Social Campaign
prompt_templates.prompt: Use Content Creator to adapt the following blog content into posts for LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram. Apply platform-specific best practices from the reference guides.

prompt_templates.title: Voice Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Run scripts/brand_voice_analyzer.py on [file] to analyze the brand voice profile. Check if the formality, tone, and perspective match our brand guidelines.

prompt_templates.title: SEO Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run scripts/seo_optimizer.py on [file] with primary keyword [keyword] and secondary keywords [keywords]. Apply the recommendations to improve the SEO score above 75/100.

output_examples.input: Create a LinkedIn post about remote work productivity using the content frameworks.
Analyze this blog post for SEO optimization targeting 'content marketing strategy'.
output: Keyword Analysis: Primary keyword density, placement in headings and first paragraph
Structure Assessment: Heading count, paragraph length, internal/external links
Meta Tag Suggestions: Title, description, URL slug recommendations

output_examples.input: Check if this content matches our brand voice guidelines.

best_practices: Always run the brand voice analyzer on new content to ensure consistency before publishing
Use the SEO optimizer with a primary keyword and 3-5 secondary keywords to achieve scores above 75/100
Follow the content pillar strategy (40% educational, 25% inspirational, 25% conversational, 10% promotional) for balanced content
anti_patterns: Publishing content without running both analyzers to check voice consistency and SEO optimization
Ignoring platform-specific requirements such as posting 250-character tweets to LinkedIn
Over-optimizing keywords beyond 3% density which can trigger search engine penalties

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude, Codex, and Claude Code all support this skill for content creation tasks.

faq.question: What is the maximum content length for analysis?
faq.answer: Both scripts handle unlimited content length. The SEO optimizer scores 300-2500 words optimally.

faq.question: Does this integrate with CMS platforms?
faq.answer: The skill provides recommendations but does not directly integrate with WordPress or other CMS platforms.

faq.question: Is my content data stored or transmitted?
faq.answer: All analysis runs locally. Content is processed in memory and never transmitted externally.

faq.question: Why is my SEO score low despite keyword usage?
faq.answer: Check readability score, heading structure, internal/external links, and ensure keyword appears in the first paragraph.

faq.question: How does this compare to tools like Jasper or Copy.ai?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on analysis and optimization of human-written content rather than AI content generation.
